extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA and NIST Recommendations
extracted_playbook.description: Implement the Cross-Sector Cybersecurity Performance Goals (CPGs) developed by CISA and NIST to mitigate the issues identified in this advisory.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Security-by-Design and -Default Recommendations
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the recommendations from the joint guide 'Shifting the Balance of Cybersecurity Risk: Principles and Approaches for Security-by-Design and -Default' to reduce the prevalence of misconfigurations.

cve_id: Mitigations for Network Defenders and Software Manufacturers
